title: Insanely high ping after patch 7.21
body:
My ping is usually around 30 ms, but lately, and at completely random intervals it will spike to 200-300 and fluctuate between playable and unplayable every few seconds (60 ms to 170 back to 50 in 5 seconds). Maybe it’s a problem with my school’s WiFi, but it’s been completely fine up until this week which leads me to believe it’s a problem with the patch. Does anyone else have similar 
issues or is it just me?

League is the only game where my ping is a problem, other multiplayer games like overwatch and pubg sit at 19 consistently.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be getting packet loss here, which your ping might not pick up.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted games to really know for sure, and let me know what you find out.  Your wifi on a heavy school traffic could definitely be a culprit too, and trying a wired connection if possible could really help rule out that possibility.

this has been happening to me aswell my ping used to be solid 30ms now its spikes non-stop all game between 30 and 120 very hard to play and this just happened suddenly. This happens at my own house...
